name: Universal Cross Battle REMIX Season 1 [in Development]
name_original: Universal Cross Battle REMIX Season 1 [in Development]
description:
Fighters from the Season 1 Challenger Pack is in development. Chipflake, Starlight, Komori-chan, and Punk Oshea, have joined the battle. If you wanna play just with the base roster, then you can find the original versions in Newgrounds or itch.io. Links to them are provided down below.

Links to…

Base game on Itch.io: https://jeiarrshi.itch.io/ucbremix

Base game on Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/848936

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=64874693

Ko-Fi: https://ko-fi.com/jeiarrshi

StreamElements: JeiArrShi's tipping page (streamelements.com)

Made with the  Platform Fighter Engine: https://springrollgames.itch.io/platform-fighter-engine

Website: https://jeiarrshi.wixsite.com/remix
